name: runtime_harness

step_1_collect_inputs.description: Accept raw responses, question outputs, interaction data, or direct signal flags.

step_2_route_signals.description: Normalize, classify, and route incoming signals to appropriate kernel units.

step_3_vectorize.description: Convert routed signals into weighted vectors across dimensions.

step_4_apply_overrides.description: Apply stress-state overrides, contradiction flags, and adaptive weighting.

step_5_interpret.description: Generate motive interpretations, conflict maps, identity patterns, and relational dynamics.

step_6_compile_output.description: Assemble structured report + narrative profile using output schema and logic.

test_mode.description: Allows sandbox testing of individual pipeline phases.

notes: The runtime harness defines how the entire system executes from raw input to final report. This is the activation engine.
